addRewardItem(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: This function will add a new reward item.

params._lpRewardAmt: - The amount of reward for depositors.
params._reserve: - The reserve of the lending pool.
params.govRewardAmt: - The amount of reward for the governance stakers. Access Control: Only Lending Pools or Core
params.lpBase: - The total amount of the mToken supplied.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

readRewards(address,address,uint8,uint25.details: This function will read the available reward of the user.

params._reserve: - The reserve of the lending pool.
params._share: - The amount of mToken or stBMXX token, depending on the _type specified.

registerPools(address[]).details: This function will register the reward pools based on an array of reserves

params._reserves: - Array of addresses Access Control: Only Lending Pools

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resetReward(address,address,uint8).details: This function will reset the user's accumulated reward to 0 and set the pointer to the pool's next reward.

params._reserve: - The reserve of the lending pool.
params._type: - The type of reward. Access Control: Only Lending Pools

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateReward(address,address,uint8,uint2.details: Called by LendingPool to accumulate and update the reward for a user.

params._num: The number of reward items to update. Input 0 to update all available reward items. Access Control: Only Lending Pools*

updateRewards(address,address,uint256,ui.details: This function will update both the Depositor and Governance reward of the user.

params._num: - The number of reward items to update. Input 0 to update all available reward items. Access Control: Only Lending Pools
params._reserve: - The reserve of the lending pool.
params._sharesGov: - The amount of stBMXX token the user has.
params._sharesLp: - The amount of the mToken the user has.

withdrawFromVault(uint8,address,address,.details: This function will withdraw the reward and send to the user.

params._amount: - The amount to pay. Access Control: Only Lending Pools
